alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Garfield; McCone; Prairie (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 5:16PM MDT until July 13 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Garfield County in northeastern Montana... Southern McCone County in northeastern Montana... Northwestern Prairie County in northeastern Montana... Southwestern Dawson County in northeastern Montana... * Until 615 PM MDT. * At 516 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 15 miles northeast of Nelson Creek Rec Area to 7 miles east of Edwards, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Circle, Flowing Wells Rest Area, Cohagen, Nelson Creek Rec Area, Lindsay, Brockway, Hillside, Weldon, Crow Rock, Watkins, Van Norman and Mccloud. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with these storms will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
